pages.text: Before starting please $(l:rules)check the rules$() $(br2)Voice chat is a core part of the HexMC experience, heres a quick tutorial to get you chatting away! $(br2)Voice chat is completely optional and we disucss how to disable it in a later page

pages.title: Getting started
pages.text: $(li)Press $(l)V$() to open the Voice chat settings $(li)Press settings $(li)Press Enable Microphone testing $(br2)if you cant hear your mic go to the troubleshooting page. $(br2)If you can hear your mic your now ready to speak to everyone! Press the $(l)Caps Lock$()(default) key to talk.

pages.title: Disabling Voice chat
pages.text: $(li)Press $(l)V$() to open the Voice chat settings $(li)Press the small speaker icon $(li)Done you will no longer hear voice chat! $(br2)Alternatively you can also press the $(l)N$() Key to toggle voice chat on or off

pages.title: Troubleshooting
pages.text: To troubleshoot we reccomend using the official Simple Voice Chat wiki.
